/*
 * This file is generated using typical-template.
 */
package examples

import examples.DtoModel

/**
 * Generate the content for the template SimpleDto filled up
 * with the content of the model [examples.DtoModel].
 */
object class SimpleDto {

    fun renderTemplate(model: DtoModel): String {
        return """
          |
          |
          |data class Author(
          |  val firstname: String,
          |  val lastname: String,
          |)
        """.trimMargin(marginPrefix = "|")
    }
}
